display.title: The Old Jameson Distillery
display.description:
Yup, Irish people also like whiskey. The distillery is no longer functional, but it's genuine: it's the location of an old Jameson factory. The tour presents the process of making whiskey, from drying the barley until distillation. The guide will tell funny little stories about the work in the factory.

At the end of the tour you get a complimentary drink: either whiskey on the rocks, either a whiskey cocktail. If you volunteer to do the tasting test, you will get even more free whiskey.
